column4: Can someone recoment a wlan-client-usb-stick that works in Ububtu, without ndiswrapper and other strange things. Something that has support in the kernel and supports WPA2 etc...

unfortunately, it's impossible to tell what chipset is in the box. My recommendation: buy from a shop that'll give you an exchange if it doesn't work. Try until you find one that works out of the box.
rule of thumb: the cheaper, the better.
